text:
HI
We getting so many errors in last 2-3 weeks with HubSpot CLI. Can someone help to identify issues?

[ERROR] Unable to upload “/www/HubSpot/master/dist/……………………/proximanova-bold-webfont.ttf”. The post to “/………../proximanova-bold-webfont.ttf” in portal 465…… failed due to a server error. Please try again or visit <https://help.HubSpot.com/> to submit a ticket or contact HubSpot Support if the issue persists.
is there a visual studio code extension for the new dnd tags?
I believe <@U26B530N6> is working on adding these
I’m working on getting those added to <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubL-Language-Extension>

The extension is open source, so if you’re interested in contributing see the message at the bottom of the readme.

You could also port it to a different editor if you prefer something else. :)
